required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Shroom Tech Sport Supplementation and Concurrent Training
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Shroom Tech Sport Supplementation and Concurrent Training on Body Composition, Performance and Health in Collegiate-aged Men

brief_summary.textblock: This study will examine how the supplement Shroom Tech Sport (STS) affects body composition and different performance and health measures over the course of 12 weeks. The supplement will be combined with a concurrent training regime consisting of resistance and high intensity interval training. Subjects will be tested for percent body fat to determine body composition. Further, they will also be tested for maximal strength (squat and bench), maximal power output and fatigue, lactate threshold and maximal oxygen volume consumption (VO2max). And finally, subjects will be tested for health and hormone markers in the blood. All of these measures will be compared against a placebo group participating in the same exercise intervention.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Body Composition as Measured by Dual-energy X-ray Absorptiometry (DXA) Scan
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, after 6 weeks of training, after 12 weeks of training
primary_outcome.description: Changes in percent body fat and lean mass

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Strength as Measured by Bench and Squat One Repetition Maximum
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, after 6 weeks of training, after 12 weeks of training
primary_outcome.description: Changes in strength measures for both bench press and back squat

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Maximum Oxygen Consumption as Measured by VO2max Treadmill Protocol
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, after 6 weeks of training, after 12 weeks of training

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Lactate Threshold as Measured by Blood Lactate Threshold Treadmill Test
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, after 6 weeks of training, after 12 weeks of training
primary_outcome.description: Changes in onset of blood lactic acid accumulation

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Power as Measured by 30 second Wingate Test
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, after 6 weeks of training, after 12 weeks of training
primary_outcome.description: Changes in Peak power output and fatigue index

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Serum Hormone Concentrations as Measured by ELISA kit results
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, after 6 weeks of training, after 12 weeks of training

arm_group.description: Shroom Tech Sport is a multi-ingredient performance supplement taken, in pill form, prior to work outs to enhance workout performance.
The placebo is a calorie matched sugar pill that will be taken in the same fashion as the STS pill.

intervention.description: STS will be given every day in accordance to company guidelines for 12 weeks.
Placebo will be given in the same fashion as the STS pills guidelines for 12 weeks.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. participate in the 3-4 week supplement wash out prior to beginning the experiment (except for basic protein supplements and multivitamins)
2. have at least 1 year of recreational exercise with a minimum of three times a week
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Prior steroid use
2. History of tumors
3. Pre-existing musculoskeletal disorders

facility.name: Institute of Sports Science and Medicine, Florida State University

clinical_study.keyword: Multi-ingredient performance supplement, High Intensity Interval Training, Concurrent training
